page.title: 13Doctors,dentists,hospitals.
page.content: There is a doctors surgery at St. Columb road where people can go if they are sick,but the practice really is operated from St.Columb Major which is about 4 miles away.The doctors are called Emrys-Jones,Grundy,Gay,Rees, Turfitt and Wight.There is a surgery at Padstow as well. There is no dentist in the area.The school dentist inspects children's teeth every year,and gives treatment at the Health Centre in Newquay.Anyone wanting private treatment has to go to Newquay or somewhere else. There are no hospitals in the area,the nearest one is a small one at Newquay. If there is an accident or something serious patients have to go to either of the two Truro hospitals-Treliske Hospital or the City Hospital.
